items.content_html: Cities API is a lightweight Nest.js application providing information about cities, including a comprehensive list of cities, details of specific cities by ID, and latitude/longitude coordinates of selected cities. Explore the API's endpoints for seamless integration and retrieval of city-related data.
items.title: dhashdev/cities-api: Cities API is a lightweight Nest.js application providing information about cities, including a comprehensive list of cities, details of specific cities by ID, and latitude/longitude coordinates of selected cities. Explore the API's endpoints for seamless integration and retrieval of city-related data.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript utility for conditionally joining class names. Simplify the process of generating class names based on strings, objects, and arrays. Supports dynamic class names, handles falsy values, and allows for nested arrays.
